user_query: Edit PDF by removing selected text "College of Design and Engineering".
Set the document to Two Page View from the View menu.
Change the font of "Department of Electrical and Computer Engineering" to Arial.
Add a web link to "College of Design and Engineering" by selecting it, defining the link appearance, entering the URL, and finalizing the link.
Move the second page to the front and delete the last page.
Swap the first slide and the second slide.
Sign "GUICritic" in the "Signature of Student" with "signature.png".
Add an image "car.jpg" to the document then edit the image by flipping vertically.
Insert "car.pdf" to the document before the first page.
